trans-unit.source: Contains information about an operation parameter.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关操作参数的信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Represents the parameter name.
trans-unit.target: 表示参数名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the attributes of the associated operation parameter.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置关联操作参数的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterAttributes" /> of the associated operation parameter.
trans-unit.target: 关联的操作参数的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterAttributes" />。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo.Attributes" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 表示针对 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> 属性的 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo.Attributes" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a shallow copy of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo" /> 实例的浅表副本。

trans-unit.source: The copy of the object.
trans-unit.target: 该对象的副本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with the current object.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前对象进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.Object" /> instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: 确定两个 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 实例是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is equal, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="obj" /> 相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Generates a number corresponding to the value of the object to support the use of a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 生成一个与对象的值相对应的数字以支持使用哈希表。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the hash code value of the object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，表示对象的哈希代码值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the associated operation parameter is an In parameter; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果关联的操作参数是 In 参数，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the associated operation parameter is an In parameter; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果关联的操作参数是 In 参数，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the associated operation parameter is a locale identifier; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果关联的操作参数是区域设置标识符，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the associated operation parameter is a locale identifier; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果关联的操作参数是区域设置标识符，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the associated operation parameter is an optional parameter; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果关联的操作参数是可选参数，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the associated operation parameter is an optional parameter; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果关联的操作参数是可选参数，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the associated operation parameter is an Out parameter; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果关联的操作参数是 Out 参数，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the associated operation parameter is an Out parameter; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果关联的操作参数是 Out 参数，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the associated operation parameter is the return value for the operation; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果关联的操作参数是操作的返回值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the associated operation parameter is the return value for the operation; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果关联的操作参数是操作的返回值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the associated operation parameter.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置关联操作参数的名称。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the name of the associated operation parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示关联的操作参数的名称。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo.Name" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 表示针对 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> 属性的 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo.Name" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of the associated operation parameter.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置关联操作参数的类型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object representing the type of the associated operation parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象，表示关联的操作参数的类型。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo.ParameterType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 表示针对 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> 属性的 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo.ParameterType" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the signature position of the associated operation parameter.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置关联操作参数的签名位置。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the signature position of the associated operation parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，表示关联的操作参数的签名位置。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo.Position" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 表示针对 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> 属性的 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo.Position" />。
